query.statement: SELECT TOTAL_MON, ITAX_MON, RTAX_MON, RTNDEPT_ID, RTNDEPT_IDNM, ENTER_CD, SABUN, PAY_YMD, GAMU, GADATE, GANO FROM ( SELECT V.TOTAL_MON, V.ITAX_MON, V.RTAX_MON, C.DEPT_ID RTNDEPT_ID, (SELECT MU_NM||' '||CC_NM FROM HLDC_SC_DEPT_V WHERE DEPT_ID = C.DEPT_ID) RTNDEPT_IDNM, V.ENTER_CD, V.SABUN, V.PAY_YMD, '' GAMU, '' GADATE, NULL GANO FROM HLDC_TCPN891 V, HLDC_SC_DEPT_V B, HLDC_ST_UPJANG C WHERE (V.ENTER_CD = 'HWRC') AND (V.COST_CD = B.DEPT_ID) AND (B.CC_CD = C.CC_CD) AND (V.PAY_YMD BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#TRX_DATE#, 'YYYYMMDD'), DECODE(SUBSTR(#TRX_DATE#, 7, 2), '25', -1, 0)), 'YYYYMM')||'26' AND #TRX_DATE#) AND (C.UPJANG = #UPJANG#) AND (V.TOTAL_MON <> 0) AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM HLDC_TCPN_INTERFACE WHERE UPDATE_BY LIKE '%¿‚±ﬁ' AND ENTER_CD = V.ENTER_CD AND PAYMENT_YMD = V.PAY_YMD AND SABUN = V.SABUN)) ORDER BY V.ENTER_CD, V.PAY_YMD, V.SABUN )
